post.text: Hillary on the faith that drives her: "Do all the good you can for all the people you can in all the ways you can."

comment.author: Whitney
comment.text: Her altruism is evident in everything she says and does. People who are cynical about her motives are themselves suspicious in what motivates them so they are unable to understand this about her. They deny her motives because it serves their purpose and agenda. I trust her. Those who can't trust her are themselves untrustworthy.

replies.author: Dillon
replies.text: Hey another paid hillary supporter.... Fake

replies.author: Cole
replies.text: According to some "rational" people, the white man still retains the burden of civilizing the savage. Yaron Brook, Harry Binswanger, Elan Journo
